name: Abyssal Tiefling
description: Abyssal tieflings are descended from fiends of the Abyss, such as demons. They often exhibit traits associated with their chaotic and malevolent heritage, such as a more wild and untamed appearance. Abyssal tieflings may possess abilities that reflect the chaotic nature of the Abyss, making them formidable and unpredictable beings.

Poison Spray.description: You know the Poison Spray cantrip.

Ray of Sickness (Level 3).description: Starting at level 3, you always have Ray of Sickness prepared. You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Hold Person (Level 5).description: Starting at level 5, you always have Hold Person prepared. You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
